description: The Popup Maker – Boost Sales, Conversions, Optins, Subscribers with the Ultimate WP Popups Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘post_title’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.20.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

product.name: Popup Maker – Boost Sales, Conversions, Optins, Subscribers with the Ultimate WP Popups Builder
